com.emitrom.flash4j.core.client.geom

Class ColorTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emitrom.flash4j.core.client.ProxyObject
      • com.emitrom.flash4j.core.client.geom.ColorTransform

  • public class ColorTransform
extends ProxyObject
    The ColorTransform class lets you adjust the color values in a display object. The color adjustment or color transformation can be applied to all four channels: red, green, blue, and alpha transparency.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void concat(ColorTransform second)
      Concatenates the ColorTranform object specified by the second parameter with the current ColorTransform object and sets the current object as the result, which is an additive combination of the two color transformations.
      double getAlphaMultiplier()
      Gets the alpha multiplier.
      double getAlphaOffset()
      Gets the alpha offset.
      double getBlueMultiplier()
      Gets the blue multiplier.
      double getBlueOffset()
      Gets the blue offset.
      double getColor()
      Gets the color.The RGB color value for a ColorTransform object.
      double getGreenMultiplier()
      Gets the green multiplier.A decimal value that is multiplied with the green channel value.
      double getGreenOffset()
      Gets the green offset.A number from -255 to 255 that is added to the green channel value after it has been multiplied by the greenMultiplier value.
      double getRedMultiplier()
      Gets the red multiplier.A decimal value that is multiplied with the red channel value.
      double getRedOffset()
      Gets the red offset.A number from -255 to 255 that is added to the red channel value after it has been multiplied by the redMultiplier value.

        public void concat(ColorTransform second)
